result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ryan L Dobs

records.addlTxt: Assessment for attorney fees and costs in the amount of $2,200.00 entered as ordered by the court on 8/16/22 to pay $40.00 monthly. Final due payment due by 1/4/27.  Failure to pay is a civil judgment.  sb

Defendant Ryan L Dobs appeared by video.  Attorney James Gregory McCann appeared by video for Ryan L Dobs.  Attorney Amy E Spanczak in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Parties are prepared to enter into a deferred prosecution agreement.

AS TO COUNT 1 : Defendant was advised of constitution rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights and entered a plea of GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the guilty plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the Complaint/Information.  Court WITHHELD entry of judgment of conviction.  Deferred Prosecution Agreement received, signed and filed.
 
Court ordered case adjourned for Review in Branch 17.
Review hearing scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
/filed.
Waiver of in person appearance, filed.
/filed.
Addendum to Plea Questionnaire, filed.
/filed.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 10/06/2022, filed.
Affidavit and order for payment of attorney fees and costs due from Milwaukee County signed.  Filed by:    JAMES G MCCANN   $2,200.00
Signed and Filed:  Order for Payment of Attorney Fees and Costs Due from Milwaukee County."

Defendant Ryan L Dobs appears via video with Attorney James Gregory McCann.  Amy E Spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in Court for Plea/Sentencing hearing.  Deferred Prosecution Agreement offered by the State.  Defense motions to reschedule to allow time to locate treatment facility in Waushara County or surrounding area to monitor under conditions of DPA.  State does not object.  Adjournment granted by the Court.  Defendant approved to appear via zoom so long as the necessary documents are filed prior to the next hearing date.
Case adjourned for DPA hearing in Branch 9.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 8-4-2022, filed
Pretrial Services Status Report 8/2/22, filed
Proposed Motion and Order to Extend Deadline for Filing Plea Forms and Continuance of Plea Date, filed.

Defendant Ryan L Dobs in court with attorney James Gregory McCann, via zoom. Amy E Spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. Parties advise that there may be a possible resolution based on new tendered offer. Further, Defense counsel is requesting additional time to complete tad evaluation for possible dpa resolution. Court schedules next court date for a Plea/ Sentencing date and sets the following deadlines: 06/10/2022 deadline for the exchange of discovery with the exception of crime lab reports. 07/11/2022 deadline for filing any motions. 08/01/2022 deadline for filing change of plea forms. Case adjourned to Br 17.  Pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-04, parties are hereby notified that effective 7/30/22, this case is assigned to branch 9, Judge Paul Van Grunsven in room 632 of the Courthouse.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Supervision Report 05-25-2022

Attorney James Gregory McCann in court.  Jon R Josephsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE. Court rescheduled the scheduling conference. Case adjourned to Branch 17.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 5.12.2022
-received and filed.

Defendant Ryan L Dobs in court with attorney James Gregory McCann.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant plead not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated April 15, 2022; received and filed.

Defendant Ryan L Dobs in court, via zoom with attorney James Gregory McCann.  Amy E spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Court had defendant verify his address and phone numbr for counsel.  The Court also advised defendant he must repay Milwaukee County at the rate of $40.00 per month beginning June 1, 2022 and every month thereafter until paid in full.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing.   mn  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision report 03-31-2022, Filed.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision report 03-17-2022
Signed and filed. Sent to defense counsel.
Court orders previous conditions to remain in full force and effect.

Defendant Ryan L Dobs in court with attorney Colleen A Taylor as a friend of the court.  Amy E Spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a return on warrant. Court orders warrant canceled. Arguments heard as to bail. Court sets the case over for a status of counsel.  Status conference scheduled for March 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Email correspondence with parties. Case scheduled for Return on Warrant on 03/17/2022, Br 17.
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 500.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Defendant Ryan L Dobs not in court.  Amy E Spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Status of Counsel. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO JUDGE. Court further orders the $500.00 signature bond forfeited.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision report 03-11-2022

Defendant Ryan L Dobs in court. Amy E Spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Indigency Hearing. All parties appeared via zoom. Discussions placed on the record. Court adjourns case for a Status of Counsel date. Case adjourned to Br 17.  Status conference scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision report 03-8-2022
Indigency hearing on March 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ryan L Dobs in court.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present.  Defendant appears without counsel.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17.   Court orders the case adjourned for CAUSE for an Indigency Hearing.  Indigency hearing scheduled for March 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision report 02-14-2022, Filed.
Pretrial Services Violation Report 02-7-2022, filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Ryan L Dobs in court with attorney Matt W Kline.  Defendant Ryan L Dobs in custody.  amy E spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ryan L Dobs appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS NOT INDIGENT.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Ryan L Dobs
Current: 504 Horne St, Redgranite, WI 54970 United States  (Effective: 02-04-2022)
Prior: 3870 East Oakwood Road, Oak Creek, WI 53154
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Ryan L Dobs not in court.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. The forfeiture order is stayed for 30 days pending notice to the defendant. Court makes a finding that there is no possible victim identified, therefore, restitution is not an issue.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 1/28/22 @ 2:30p
